project.name: vscode-sqlite-viewer
project.description: FutureTranz Technology project: vscode sqlite viewer (TypeScript)

strategy.buyer_persona: IT managers at mid-sized enterprises seeking a TypeScript-based web app for efficient SQLite database management with high capital efficiency and low regulatory risk.
strategy.competitive_advantage: High-efficiency SQLite database viewer built in TypeScript — streamlines data visualization for B2B applications, surpassing basic alternatives with real-time sync capabilities and tailored user experience.
strategy.competitors: SQLite Viewer, SQLite Browser, DB Browser for SQLite, DBeaver
strategy.defensibility_moat: Switching Costs | Users invest time and workflows into the vscode-sqlite-viewer, with high hours invested creating institutional knowledge that makes migrating to alternatives cumbersome over time.
strategy.investment_thesis: vscode-sqlite-viewer solves low issues for TBD in a $10000M market by TBD.
strategy.investor_narrative: In the B2B market, businesses struggle with managing SQLite databases effectively within their development environments, representing a significant opportunity in the $25B market. The "vscode-sqlite-viewer" is a web app that provides a seamless experience for viewing and managing SQLite databases, leveraging its high gross margin of 80% to position itself as a cost-effective solution. With 80 hours invested and currently at the MVP stage, this project is backed by a strong funding readiness score of 75, indicating substantial potential for growth and sustainability. Defensible through its unique integration with VSCode and a clear SaaS subscription revenue model, it aims to capture a share of the $50M serviceable obtainable market.
